text:
Missed Korean BBQ from jeju. Hence, my wife brought us here to try out. Liked the environment very cooling evening usually.

Enjoyed the food very much. Beef n pork were fantastic. Especially last serving was pork belly!! well cooked by the staff ^_^v. Nice n fresh side dish. Compared to Singapore... =_=" (lets end it here)

Good service.!

Ps: Sadly doesnt have touch n go. Only cash or credit. Well, small matter.

This Korean BBQ spot in Iskandar is a hidden gem! Perfectly grilled meat by the staff, no oil smoke on your clothes. The ambiance is cozy and clean, with free-flowing side dishes like kimchi and steamed egg. Don’t miss their DIY rice balls—soft, flavorful, and addictive. A must-visit for BBQ lovers!
Lot's of Korean dining inside the restaurant, so I think the taste should be really authentic! Taste Good! Portion is big! Highly recommended!

I’ve been here three times already and love it! The best part is that you don’t have to grill the meat yourself. Set meals are generous and great value for money. Very delicious even the side dishes are so tasty, can refills! One more highlight is the convenient parking – no traffic or hassle at all.

The service here is top notch! They even can help you peng gang outside so your clothes wont stink! Bbq till perfect texture lor! And really need to try out their other dishes, which i super recommend the korean rice ball. SIBEH SHIOK! love their cold noodles too, the soup is sour n sweet to my perfect liking! Price very affordable too. Super recommend
